divs: sighting detailsit was 10:30 p.m.sunday 6\29\12\ had telescope out and was looking at the moon which was south.when witnessed a shooting star south around 11:45p.m.at 12:00 midnight saw a bright white flash of light south like some one taking a picture.then at 12:30 i witnessed 4 bright white flash's of light west that time i could make out an object that look like it was taking pictures.then at 1:00 a.m.i saw another shooting star west and then came another bright white flash of light this time from the east and the power flickerd,it was for a breif few secends.i do not know the shape or the size because it was very high and hard to see even with binocklears.it was neat to watch but if it did'nt light up you would never see it.after the flash from the east and the power loss that was brief i watched for another two hour's but no signs,it was gone.
